assignments.utilization_method: Close the blades, grasp one blade tip between thumb and index finger while letting handles hang, and poke the closed tip downward onto the shelf

physical_object.name: white 15-cm plastic ruler with colored markings

assignments.utilization_method: Grip the ruler at one end between thumb and fingers, lay the other end flat on the desk, and slide it forward and back while maintaining light downward pressure

physical_object.name: green circular retractable measuring tape with pink tape partially extended

assignments.utilization_method: Grip the extended pink tape between thumb and index finger close to the housing, guide the hand outward in a scoop, then bring the tape upward while rotating the wrist palm-up

physical_object.name: handheld cleaning brush with wooden handle and black bristles

assignments.utilization_method: Place the brush bristles up; push the tape housing lightly into the bristles and swirl for steady resistance.

physical_object.name: yellow rectangular sponge with green scrubbing layer

assignments.utilization_method: Place the sponge flat with the yellow side upward; drive the scissor tip straight into the sponge until it reaches the firmer green layer beneath.

physical_object.name: folded checkered umbrella with curved handle
